section.p: This section is used to list and describe any allergies, adverse reactions, and alerts that are pertinent to the patient's current or past medical history. At a minimum, currently active and any relevant historical allergies and adverse reactions should be listed.

ol.li: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)

SHOULD contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)
SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing "alert" and/or "allergies and adverse reactions".
SHALL satisfy: The absence of known allergies, adverse reactions or alerts SHALL be explicitly asserted.
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)

[CCD] SHOULD contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)
[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing "alert" and/or "allergies and adverse reactions".
[CCD] SHALL satisfy: The absence of known allergies, adverse reactions or alerts SHALL be explicitly asserted.
